korean: 아침에 핸드폰 재난문자가 계속 울려서 깼어.
창밖을 보니 비가 억수같이 쏟아지고 있었어.
뉴스에서 침수 피해 소식을 보니까 걱정됐다.
우리 동네 지하주차장도 물 들어왔다는 소문 들었어.
베란다 창문 틈으로 빗물이 새서 수건으로 막았다.
하루 종일 비 오는 소리만 들렸어.
집에 가만히 있는 게 제일 안전한 것 같다.
배달 시킬까 했는데 배달 라이더분들 생각하니까 그냥 집에 있는 거 먹었어.
저녁 되니까 비가 조금 약해지긴 했는데 아직도 많이 온다.
내일 아침까지 계속 비 온대. 빨리 그쳤으면 좋겠다.
english: A heavy rain warning came up, so I canceled going out.
I woke up to my phone buzzing with emergency alerts all morning.
Looking outside the window, rain was pouring down heavily.
There was thunder and lightning too, which was kind of scary.
I was worried seeing news about flooding damage on TV.
I heard rumors that water got into our neighborhood's underground parking lot.
Rainwater was leaking through the balcony window gaps, so I stuffed towels there.
All day long, I basically just heard the sound of rain.
It seems safest to just stay put at home.
I thought about ordering delivery, but thinking about the delivery riders, I just ate what I had at home.
By evening the rain got a bit lighter, but it's still coming down pretty hard.
They say it's gonna keep raining until tomorrow morning. I really hope it stops soon.
